ygData.subject: Practice Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been trying the practice research with no success. I was hoping someone was able to help me. I ve researched real spells with no problem, so i m
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I've been trying the practice research with no success. I was hoping someone
was able to help me. I've researched real spells with no problem, so i'm
wondering why this is much harder. And I refuse to believe that it is
bugged!

Basically I add Bat Wings, Bone Chips, and Lapis Laluli (sp?) to the
Concordance of Research and hit combine. It says these items do not combine.
I have tried it with the quill and paper in my inventory (not that I needed
them with REAL research).

I know there is a secret to this, I just don't know what it is. I'd be much
appreciative if someone was able to share it with me.

Regards,
Tremor of Bristlebain
